screenplays.title: The Last Station
screenplays.logline: A retired railway conductor discovers a conspiracy that threatens the very foundation of his small town's existence.

screenplays.title: Monsoon Memories
screenplays.logline: Three generations of women unravel family secrets during one transformative monsoon season.

screenplays.title: Between Worlds
screenplays.logline: A quantum physicist's experiment goes awry, leaving her stranded between parallel realities.

screenplays.title: The Ferryman
screenplays.logline: A mystical boatman guides souls across a river, but one passenger changes everything.

screenplays.title: Silent Echoes
screenplays.logline: A sound designer begins hearing voices that predict tragic events before they occur.

screenplays.title: City of Shadows
screenplays.logline: A corrupt city's underbelly comes alive through the eyes of a journalist seeking redemption.
